page.shortlink: api star property to xml function
page.prototype: dim resultXML as C = *PROPERTY_TO_XML(prop as p,topTag as c[,flags as c])

argument.name: prop
argument.description: The dot variable to convert to XML.

argument.name: topTag
argument.description: The name of the top-level XML tag.

return.name: resultXML
return.description: Returns an XML representation of the dot variable.

page.example:
DIM test as P test.namefirst = "John" test.namelast = "Smith" test.otherxml =<<%xml% <note> <to>Dion</to> <from>Dave</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget Wednesday's Q∓A session!</body> </note> %xml%
DIM output as C output = *property_to_xml(test,"test") ? output = <test namefirst = "John" namelast = "Smith" otherxml = "<note> <to>Dion</to> <from>Dave</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget Wednesday's Q&mp;A session!</body> </note> " />
